CustomField.formula: ROUND(Suryo__c * BuyTankaUSD__c,3) +TotalAmountofBuyingFCYAdjust__c /* clofor_com_cfs__Suryo__c * if( ISNULL(clofor_com_cfs__BuyTankaUSD__c), 0, clofor_com_cfs__BuyTankaUSD__c ) + clofor_com_cfs__Cost_Allocation_Margin_USD__c */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Total Amount of Selling(FCY)=Unit Price of Selling(Local)*Charge Unit (Total).
CustomField.label: TOTAL AMOUNT OF BUYING(USD)
